title: Can't connect NA
body: Kicked me mid Ranked game and now the client won't connect. Anyone else?

replies.body: There were some issues that [Comcast had with their network](http://forums.xfinity.com/t5/X1/TV-Service-Interruption-10-11-2016/td-p/2813767) that has since been resolved. If you're still experiencing issues connection to League, let me know.
